Articles.Content:
Hi there:

At last i've decided that could be interesting to put all my new KSP renders in one thread instead of starting lots of them. Comfortable for me and i hope too for the people interested on having a look at them.

MÃƒÂ¼n:

Interplanetary Bus:

Alone With MechJeb:

Request: Closed

I will be taking request in vacations

Of course i would really appreciate your feedback, hoping you enjoy the renders. Thanks a lot in advance and

Cheers!

Edited June 9, 2014 by tajampi

The render with the mun is very nice and I like the blur effect but I feel that some of the textures especially the munar surface could do with a bit of work.

Maybe you could add a normal texture to it to add some depth or include a few rocks to make the surface more interesting.

Is this all created from scratch?

All in all though very nice.
Like it. How did you get the game models?
whoa!Could you please make one of those for me,based off of this picture?:
Lol, you just copied and pasted that straight from Raredens thread.

Hi all:

Although Orian requested that from Rareden I should give it a try... Don't expect much anyway, as a beginner i am. If Rareden does his version, i'm done... The comparison is going to hurt (me, of course) But as i always like a new work from him, let's tempt the luck!

Concerning the KSP parts import, i use Blender .mu import/export addon by Taniwha. Search for it in the tools and applications thread in this Forum. It's a fantastic tool, although it fails to import parts from 0.20 Part Tools script in Unity

Hope it all helps and Cheers!

Nice renders. What software do you use? Anyways, if you want to discuss and show off your work to other 3d artists check out this thread.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/45369-Your-Blender-Maya-3dMax-etc-fan-art-section-%28Animation-Pics-etc%29

Hi all:

Although Orian requested that from Rareden I should give it a try... Don't expect much anyway, as a beginner i am. If Rareden does his version, i'm done... The comparison is going to hurt (me, of course) But as i always like a new work from him, let's tempt the luck!

Concerning the KSP parts import, i use Blender .mu import/export addon by Taniwha. Search for it in the tools and applications thread in this Forum. It's a fantastic tool, although it fails to import parts from 0.20 Part Tools script in Unity

Hope it all helps and Cheers!

Rareden isn't making artowrk currently,so you'll have the leverage

New render, sorry for not doing the reques and for not uploading nothing in years

I will start taking request in 30 days, when i have more free time

Cheers!
